Posts.Content: hello everyone..my breast cancer op was on wednesday but today i feel so sad .cant get a positive frame of mind.just want my old self back.nobody around me seems to understand and why should they,i never did before it happened to me. i had a wide local excision and sentinel node removal.my cancer is in right breast grade 1 invasive ductal pr/er positive. how do u get to be so positive.
Posts.Title: hoping to find some comfort from people who understand

Posts.Content: i am 2 weeks post  surgery.wide local excision.the scar is neat but still some hardness and numbness but i have noticed  tiny lump...wot can fhis be.it is on zurface and is hard.surely not anything to worry about..anyone elsd had this..i am worried.will speak to nurse tomo
Posts.Title: small lump 2weeks after surgery

Posts.Content: thank you so so much sassy...how strange that talking this way is moving me to tears.i dont know u and u dont know me but i so appreciate anyone taking the time to listen and yeah it is better talking to someone who knows. you have a good day too.xxxx
Posts.Title: finished rads 3 weeks ago - fatigue

Posts.Content: hi kate.."you will get better honest" mademe smile..thank you
Posts.Title: finished rads 3 weeks ago - fatigue

Posts.Content: after diagnosis in oct 2012 and following wle in november i have just finished my radiotherapy.because some days i feel normal and happy i feel i should be considering returning to part time work only problem is a day later i feel totally whacked,weak tearful,moody and dont think i could manage the hour journey to the office and hour back plus work even for 3-4 hours.i keep thinking im on the mend and four months off work seems a long time but trying to explain to colleagues and friends the ups and downs is too difficult..ive given up trying.just sounds like im one of the weaker ones!! not the person full of positivity that worked thru their rads!!!!! then i feel vulnerable and pathetic.hopeless even.im ok today but just had two horrendously tiring days with me losing my control with family...and shouting..i hope they watch the new tv advert and maybe that will remind people around me that its not all about operations,and trreatment and positivity..its about loss of confidence,energy,joi de vivre.....am i alone with these views.i am trying so hard to get back to my optimistic happy smiling self but im just not able to sustain it.
Posts.Title: finished rads 3 weeks ago - fatigue
